faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to the most common questions about DaVeri.
faq.a1: DaVeri is a platform that lets you create and configure AI chatbots for your website. Upload your company's content and the bot will respond based on your materials.
faq.a2: No. DaVeri is designed so anyone can configure a bot without any technical knowledge. Everything happens through a visual panel.
faq.a3: Each bot response uses one credit. Your monthly credit limit depends on your plan. Credits reset at the beginning of each billing period.
faq.q4: Can I change my plan at any time?
faq.a4: Yes. You can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time. Changes take effect immediately.
faq.a5: We support PDF, TXT, DOC, DOCX, and CSV files. Maximum file size is 10MB.
